Design : A single-blinded , randomize control clinical trial . Sample : 172 child DCD . Interventions : AT-NMT , NMT , AT , intervention 12 week . Major outcome : Outcomes evaluate baseline , post-intervention , 3-month follow-up . A motor control test ( MCT ) give composite latency score , prefrontal cortex EEG record MCT measure mental attention level , surface electromyography recording MCT indicate low limb muscle onset latency .
